verses.text: \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \add man\add* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w sick|strong="G0770"\w*, \add named\add* \w Lazarus|strong="G2976"\w*, \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w Bethany|strong="G0963"\w*, the \w town|strong="G2968"\w* of \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w sister|strong="G0079"\w* \w Martha|strong="G3136"\w*.

(It \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \add that\add* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w anointed|strong="G0218"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* with \w ointment|strong="G3464"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wiped|strong="G1591"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* \w with|strong="G2359"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w hair|strong="G2359"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w Lazarus|strong="G2976"\w* was \w sick|strong="G0770"\w*.)

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* his \w sisters|strong="G0079"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w behold|strong="G1492"\w*, he \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* thou \w lovest|strong="G5368"\w* is \w sick|strong="G0770"\w*.

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add that\add*, he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w This|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w sickness|strong="G0769"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w death|strong="G2288"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w for|strong="G5228"\+w* \+w the glory|strong="G1391"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w might be glorified|strong="G1392"\+w* \+w thereby|strong="G1223"\+w*.\wj*

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w loved|strong="G0025"\w* \w Martha|strong="G3136"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w sister|strong="G0079"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lazarus|strong="G2976"\w*.

\w When|strong="G5613"\w* he had \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he was \w sick|strong="G0770"\w*, he \w abode|strong="G3306"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w still|strong="G3306"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w same|strong="G3739"\w* place \w where|strong="G5117"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1899"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w that|strong="G5124"\w* saith \w he|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3101"\w* \add his\add* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \wj  \+w Let us go|strong="G0071"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w Judæa|strong="G2449"\+w* \+w again|strong="G3825"\+w*.\wj*

\add His\add* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Master|strong="G4461"\w*, the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* of \w late|strong="G3568"\w* \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* to \w stone|strong="G3034"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* goest \w thou|strong="G5217"\w* \w thither|strong="G1563"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*?

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, \wj  \+w Are there|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3780"\+w* \+w twelve|strong="G1427"\+w* \+w hours|strong="G5610"\+w* \+w in the day|strong="G2250"\+w*? \+w If|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w any man|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w walk|strong="G4043"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the day|strong="G2250"\+w*, \+w he stumbleth|strong="G4350"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w*, \+w because|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w he seeth|strong="G0991"\+w* \+w the light|strong="G5457"\+w* \+w of|strong="G2889"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5127"\+w* \+w world|strong="G2889"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w a man|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w walk|strong="G4043"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the night|strong="G3571"\+w*, \+w he stumbleth|strong="G4350"\+w*, \+w because|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w there is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w no|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w light|strong="G5457"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

These \w things|strong="G5023"\w* said \w he|strong="G2036"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w that|strong="G5124"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Our|strong="G2257"\+w* \+w friend|strong="G5384"\+w* \+w Lazarus|strong="G2976"\+w* \+w sleepeth|strong="G2837"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w I go|strong="G4198"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w I may awake|strong="G1852"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w out of sleep|strong="G1852"\+w*.\wj*

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* he \w sleep|strong="G2837"\w*, he shall do \w well|strong="G4982"\w*.

\w Howbeit|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w spake|strong="G2046"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G1565"\w* \w thought|strong="G1380"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he had \w spoken|strong="G3004"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* taking of \w rest|strong="G2838"\w* in \w sleep|strong="G5258"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w plainly|strong="G3954"\w*, \wj  \+w Lazarus|strong="G2976"\+w* \+w is dead|strong="G0599"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w I am glad|strong="G5463"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w your sakes|strong="G5209"\+w* \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w I was|strong="G2252"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w there|strong="G1563"\+w*, \+w to the intent|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w ye may believe|strong="G4100"\+w*; \+w nevertheless|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w let us go|strong="G0071"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w Thomas|strong="G2381"\w*, which is \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Didymus|strong="G1324"\w*, unto his \w fellowdisciples|strong="G4827"\w*, \w Let|strong="G0071"\w* \w us|strong="G2249"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w go|strong="G0071"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we may \w die|strong="G0599"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

Then \w when|strong="G3767"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w*, \w he|strong="G0846"\w* found \w that|strong="G2147"\w* he \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \add lain\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w grave|strong="G3419"\w* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w already|strong="G2235"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w Bethany|strong="G0963"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* nigh \w unto|strong="G1451"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \w about|strong="G5613"\w* \w fifteen|strong="G1178"\w* \w furlongs|strong="G4712"\w* \w off|strong="G0575"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4012"\w* \w Martha|strong="G3136"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w*, \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w comfort|strong="G3888"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w Martha|strong="G3136"\w*, as soon \w as|strong="G5613"\w* she \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* was \w coming|strong="G2064"\w*, went and \w met|strong="G5221"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w sat|strong="G2516"\w* \add still\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w house|strong="G3624"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w Martha|strong="G3136"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* thou hadst \w been|strong="G2258"\w* \w here|strong="G5602"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w had|strong="G2348"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w died|strong="G2348"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* I \w know|strong="G1492"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* even \w now|strong="G3568"\w*, \w whatsoever|strong="G3745"\w* thou wilt \w ask|strong="G0154"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w God|strong="G2316"\w* will \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \add it\add* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*.
\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w brother|strong="G0080"\+w* \+w shall rise again|strong="G0450"\+w*.\wj*

\w Martha|strong="G3136"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, I \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he shall rise \w again|strong="G0450"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* the \w last|strong="G2078"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w the resurrection|strong="G0386"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the life|strong="G2222"\+w*: \+w he that believeth|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1691"\+w*, \+w though|strong="G2579"\+w* \+w he were dead|strong="G0599"\+w*, \+w yet|strong="G2579"\+w* \+w shall he live|strong="G2198"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w whosoever|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w liveth|strong="G2198"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w believeth|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1691"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G0599"\+w* \+w never|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w die|strong="G0599"\+w*. \+w Believest thou|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5124"\+w*?\wj*

She \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Yea|strong="G3483"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w art|strong="G1488"\w* the \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, which should \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when she \w had|strong="G2036"\w* \w so|strong="G5023"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, she went her \w way|strong="G0565"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w called|strong="G5455"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w sister|strong="G0079"\w* \w secretly|strong="G2977"\w*, \w saying|strong="G2036"\w*, The \w Master|strong="G1320"\w* is \w come|strong="G3918"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w calleth|strong="G5455"\w* for \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*.

As soon \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w she|strong="G1565"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add that\add*, she \w arose|strong="G1453"\w* \w quickly|strong="G5035"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w was|strong="G2064"\w* not \w yet|strong="G3768"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w town|strong="G2968"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* that \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w where|strong="G3699"\w* \w Martha|strong="G3136"\w* \w met|strong="G5221"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

The \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* which \w were|strong="G5607"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w house|strong="G3614"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w comforted|strong="G3888"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, when they \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* she rose \w up|strong="G0450"\w* \w hastily|strong="G5030"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* went \w out|strong="G1831"\w*, \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, She \w goeth|strong="G5217"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w grave|strong="G3419"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w weep|strong="G2799"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* was \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w where|strong="G3699"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w*, and \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, she fell \w down|strong="G4098"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* thou hadst \w been|strong="G2258"\w* \w here|strong="G5602"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w had|strong="G0599"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w died|strong="G0599"\w*.

\w When|strong="G5613"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w weeping|strong="G2799"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w also|strong="G4905"\w* \w weeping|strong="G2799"\w* which \w came|strong="G4905"\w* with \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \w he|strong="G1438"\w* \w groaned|strong="G1690"\w* in the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* was \w troubled|strong="G5015"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w Where|strong="G4226"\+w* \+w have ye laid|strong="G5087"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*?\wj* They \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w see|strong="G1492"\w*.
\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w wept|strong="G1145"\w*.
\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G1492"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* he \w loved|strong="G5368"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*!

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* this \w man|strong="G3778"\w*, which \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* the \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* of the \w blind|strong="G5185"\w*, have \w caused|strong="G4160"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* this \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w should|strong="G0599"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* have \w died|strong="G0599"\w*?

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w groaning|strong="G1690"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w grave|strong="G3419"\w*. It \w was|strong="G2258"\w* a \w cave|strong="G4693"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w stone|strong="G3037"\w* \w lay|strong="G1945"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w Take ye away|strong="G0142"\+w* \+w the stone|strong="G3037"\+w*.\wj* \w Martha|strong="G3136"\w*, the \w sister|strong="G0079"\w* of him that was \w dead|strong="G2348"\w*, \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, by this \w time|strong="G2235"\w* he \w stinketh|strong="G3605"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he hath \w been|strong="G2076"\w* \add dead\add* four \w days|strong="G5066"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Said I|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w unto thee|strong="G4671"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w*, \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w thou wouldest believe|strong="G4100"\+w*, \+w thou shouldest see|strong="G3700"\+w* \+w the glory|strong="G1391"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*?\wj*

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* they took \w away|strong="G0142"\w* the \w stone|strong="G3037"\w* \add from the place\add* \w where|strong="G3757"\w* the \w dead|strong="G2348"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w laid|strong="G2749"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w lifted|strong="G0142"\w* \w up|strong="G0507"\w* \add his\add* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w*, \+w I thank|strong="G2168"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4671"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w thou hast heard|strong="G0191"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3450"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w knew|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w thou hearest|strong="G0191"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w always|strong="G3842"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w because of|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w the people|strong="G3793"\+w* \+w which stand by|strong="G4026"\+w* \+w I said|strong="G2036"\+w* \+add it\+add*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w they may believe|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w thou|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w hast sent|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*.\wj*
